source_sentence: 聞已合掌，心生歡喜，復教他人，令得聞持。
translation: Having heard it, they joined their palms and rejoiced. They also taught others to hear and retain it.

source_sentence: 他人聞已，展轉相教，乃至三千人。
translation: After the others heard it, they taught it to each other in turn, up to 3,000 people.

source_sentence: 此三千人異口同音，稱諸佛名，一心敬禮；
translation: These three thousand people spoke the names of the buddhas in unison and paid respect to them with one-pointed veneration.

source_sentence: 如是敬禮諸佛因緣功德力故，即得超越無數億劫生死之罪。
translation: Thus, because of the merit and power of venerating the causes and conditions of the buddhas, they'll be able to transcend the sins of birth-and-death for countless millions of eons.

source_sentence: 初千人者，華光佛為首，下至毘舍浮佛，於莊嚴劫得成為佛，過去千佛是也；
translation: The first thousand were led by the buddha Flower Light Buddha and descended to Vaiśravaṇa Buddha, where they attained buddhahood in the world age of Adornment.

source_sentence: 其中千人者，拘留孫佛為首，下至樓至佛，於賢劫中次第成佛；
translation: A thousand of them, led by Krakucchanda Buddha, attained buddhahood one after another in the world age of the wise.

source_sentence: 後千人者，日光佛為首，下至須彌相佛，於星宿劫中當得成佛。」

source_sentence: 禮三寶已，次復懺悔。
translation: After paying homage to the Three Treasures, he then repented.

source_sentence: 「已懺地獄報竟，今當復次懺悔三惡道報。
translation: Having already confessed the retribution of hell, I will now next confess the retribution of the three evil destinies.

source_sentence: 經中佛說：『多欲之人，多求利故，苦惱亦多。
translation: In the sūtras, the Buddha says, 'Many people with many desires often seek profit, and so much suffering and distress arise.

source_sentence: 知足之人，雖臥地上，猶以為樂；
translation: A contented person, even lying on the ground, would still think it is a pleasure.

source_sentence: 不知足者，雖處天堂，猶不稱意。』
translation: Those who don't know how to satisfy themselves, even though they're in heaven, still aren't satisfied.'

source_sentence: 但世間人，忽有急難，便能捨財，不計多少；
translation: But the people of this world suddenly had an urgent difficulty and were able to give up their wealth without calculating how much.

source_sentence: 而不知此身，臨於三塗深坑之上，一息不還便應墮落。
translation: They don't know that this body is facing the deep pit of the three destinies, and if they don't return after one breath, they'll fall down.

source_sentence: 忽有知識營功福德，令修未來善法資糧，執此慳心無肯作理。
translation: Suddenly, there's a man of knowledge who cultivates merit and causes future accumulation of good qualities to cultivate the accumulation of good qualities, cling to this stinginess and unwilling to do anything reasonable.

source_sentence: 夫如此者，極為愚惑。
translation: Such a person is extremely ignorant and deluded.

source_sentence: 何以故爾？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 經中佛說：『生時不賚一文而來，死亦不持一文而去，苦身積聚為之憂惱，
translation: The Buddha said in the Sūtra: When one is born, he does not come and go with a single syllable; when one dies, he does not depart with a single syllable. That mass of painful flesh constitutes his distress.

source_sentence: 於己無益，徒為他有。
translation: They are of no help to themselves but exist only for the sake of others.

source_sentence: 無善可恃，無德可怙，致使命終，墮諸惡道。』
translation: There's no goodness to rely on, no virtue to rely on, and when their mission ends, they'll fall into bad destinies.'

source_sentence: 是故弟子等，今日稽顙，懇到歸依於佛。
translation: That's why the disciples and so forth are today practicing repentance, earnestly relying on the Buddha.

source_sentence: 「弟子，今日次復懺悔，畜生道中，無所識知罪報。
translation: “Dear disciple, today I will again repent. In the realm of animals there is no one who knows the retribution for my sins.

source_sentence: 懺悔畜生道中，負重牽犁，償他宿債罪報。
translation: He repents of the sinful retribution of carrying a heavy plow in the path of animals and paying back the past debts of others.

source_sentence: 懺悔畜生道中，不得自在，為他斫刺，屠割罪報。
translation: They repent that they won't be allowed to do so in the animal kingdom, and they'll be stabbed by others and slaughtered as a result of their sins.

source_sentence: 懺悔畜生無足、二足、四足、多足罪報。
translation: They repent of the sins of animals that lack legs, have two legs, four legs, and many legs.

source_sentence: 懺悔畜生道中，身諸毛、羽、鱗、甲之內，為諸小虫之所唼食罪報。
translation: In the path of repentance, his body is covered with hair, feathers, scales, and armor, and he's eaten by small insects as a result of his sins.

source_sentence: 如是畜生道中，有無量罪報，今日至誠，皆悉懺悔。
translation: Thus, there are measureless rewards of these sins in the animal kingdom, and today I'm sincerely repenting them all.

source_sentence: 「次復懺悔，餓鬼道中，長飢罪報。
translation: Next, he repents again for the sin of being born in the realm of hungry ghosts and suffering from chronic hunger.

source_sentence: 懺悔餓鬼，百千萬歲，初不曾聞漿水之名罪報。
translation: For a hundred million years after repenting, the hungry ghost hadn't heard the name of the wine and water as punishment for sins at first.

source_sentence: 懺悔餓鬼，食噉膿血，糞穢罪報。
translation: They repent of the retribution of hungry ghosts who eat crude pus and blood, dung and filthy sins.

source_sentence: 懺悔餓鬼，動身之時，一切肢節火然罪報。
translation: When he repents to the hungry ghost, all his limbs and knuckles are burned as a result of sin when he moves his body.

source_sentence: 懺悔餓鬼，腹大咽小罪報。
translation: He repents of the hungry ghost's small offense of having a large throat in his belly.

source_sentence: 如是餓鬼道中，無量苦報，今日稽顙皆悉懺悔。
translation: Thus, in the path of hungry ghosthood, there are measureless painful retributions, and today I repent of them all.

source_sentence: 「次復懺悔一切鬼神脩羅道中，諭諂詐稱罪報。
translation: Next, he repents of all the ghosts and spirits in the path of the sūtras who encourage flattery and deceitfulness as the result of crimes.

source_sentence: 懺悔鬼神道中，擔沙負石，填河塞海罪報。
translation: In the path of repentance for the sins committed by ghosts and spirits, he carries sand and stones on his back and fills up a river or seas with the results of sins.

source_sentence: 懺悔羅剎、鳩槃茶，諸惡鬼神，生噉血肉，受此醜陋罪報。
translation: They repent of the bad spirits Rāṣṭrapāla and kumbhāṇḍa, who give rise to crude flesh and blood and receive the results of these ugly sins.

source_sentence: 如是鬼神道中，無量無邊，一切罪報，今日稽顙，向十方佛，大地菩薩，
translation: Thus, in the realm of ghosts and spirits, immeasurable and boundless are all the consequences of sins. Today I humbly pay homage to the buddhas of the ten directions and great enlightening beings of the earth

source_sentence: 求哀懺悔，悉令消滅。
translation: I beg to have mercy and repentance so that they may all be extinguished.

source_sentence: 「願弟子等，承是懺悔畜生等報所生功德，生生世世，滅愚癡垢，自識業緣，
translation: “May the disciples receive this repentance of the merits produced by such rewards as being an animal, so that they may be born in all worlds and cease the stain of ignorance and become aware of their own karmic conditions.

source_sentence: 智慧明照，斷惡道身。
translation: Their wisdom shines brightly, cutting off the body of bad destinies.

source_sentence: 願以懺悔餓鬼等報所生功德，生生世世，永離慳貪飢餓之苦，常飡甘露解脫之味。
translation: May they repent of the merits produced by hungry ghosts and so forth as retribution, be born in all worlds, forever part with the suffering of stinginess, greed, hunger, and hunger, and always taste the taste of liberation

source_sentence: 願以懺悔鬼神、脩羅等報所生功德，生生世世質直無諂，離邪命因，除醜陋果，
translation: May they repent of the merits produced by ghosts, spirits, titans, and other retributions, be born in the world without deceit, free from the causes of wrong livelihood, and rid themselves of the results of uglyness.

source_sentence: 福利人天。
translation: It's beneficial to humans and gods.

source_sentence: 願弟子等，從今以去，乃至道場，決定不受四惡道報，唯除大悲為眾生故，
translation: “May you, my disciples, be free from the four bad retributions of the four evil destinies as soon as you leave this world and reach enlightenment sites.

source_sentence: 以誓願力，處之無厭(禮一拜)。」
translation: With the power of my vow, I won't tire of staying there ( pays homage with one obeisance).
